content.rendered:
Directed by Milap Zaveri

Written by Milap Zaveri

Cast John Abraham (Virendra Rathod (Veer)). Manoj Bajpayee (DCP Shivansh Rathod). Aisha Sharma (Shikha). Amruta Khanvilkar (Sarita). Manish Chaudhari (Commissioner (as Manish Chaudhary)).Myrah Dandekar. Devdutta Nage (inspector Shankar Gaikwad). Arash Shukla (Little Virendra Rathod (Veer)). Nora Fatehi (Lead dancer ‘Dibar’ song). Sonu Mishra (TV reporter) . Arrchita Agarwaal (Muslim Girl (as Archita Agarwal)). Sonam Arora (Reporter Police HQ1). Joy Badlani (Inspector Raj Mohan). Raj Shekhar Chandra (Kaali Billi Constable). Amit Chaudhary (Climax Inspector #2). Priya Chauhan (Shikha Friend 1). Nilesh Dagar (Rich Boy In Car).Azb Dahal. Prashant Deshpande (Doctor Fire Specialist #1). Maisha Dixit (Pari Rathod). Dinesh Goyal (Climax Inspector #3). Pradeep Jangid (Climax Inspector #1). Jay Joshi (Aslam). Jehangir Karkaria (Jamshed Uncle). Majid Khan (Muslim Father). Abhishek Khandekar (Sadashiv Patil). Rajesh Khera (Satish Bhosale). Kamal Krishna (Safehouse Cop #2). Priyankar Kumar (Reporter Police HQ2). Ratnesh Mani (DCP Rane). Kapil Mehta (Dr. Mehta). Jackey Mishra (Police). Anil Nagarkar (Yari Road Constable). Sarthak Nagda (Street Urchin). Uday Nene (Shinde). Bachchan Pacheria (Old Man 1). Neetu Pachori (Hospital Reporter). Mugdha Pande (Shikha Friend 2). Neetu Pandey (Aslam’s Mother (as Neetu Pande)). Chetan Pandit (Inspector Shiv Rathod). Krunal Pandit (Beach Minister). Kamal Krishna Poudyal (Inspector). Irffan Qadri (Shaikh Sami Usman). Vivaan Rajput (Rich Kid Accident). Ravinder Rora (Old Man 2). Aakash Sachdev (Young Citizen Boy 2). Shaikh Sami (Inspector Kadri). Aditi Sanwal (Girl In Car).Jigar Saraswat. Jay Saumik (Aslam). Ankur Sharma (Inspector Mohan Srivastav).Sujeet Kumar Sharma. Manoj Singh (Poor Man). Rashmi Singh (Mohan Srivastav Wife). Yogesh Soman (Minister). Krish Soni (Kid 2). Vinod Suryavanshi (Hawaldar Bapat). Pankh Thakur (Matchstick Tricks Boy). Ajay Tiwari (Climax Inspector #4). Braj Kishore Tiwari (Police Inspector). Akhil Vaid (Bar Owner). Ganesh Yadav (Damle)

Language Hindi

Producers Monisha Advani. Nikkhil Advani. Madhu Bhojwani. Hemraj Dogra. Karan Joshi. Bhushan Kumar. Krishan Kumar. Priyanka Mehrotra. Satish Poddar. Rameshchandra Yadav

Production Emmay Entertainment. T-Series
